item.title: Stochastic Process Part 1 - Introduction to Stochastic Processes
item.author: chahalinder0007.gmail.com (Inderjit Singh Chahal)
item.description: In this part 1, we will look at getting a better understanding of a stochastic process, in the next one we will look at some practical implementations to build on this understanding to solve some real-world problems. What is a Stochastic Process Wikipedia defines a stochastic process as a mathematical object that is defined by a family of random variables. A better way to look at it would be It is a collection of random “events”, each happening with either fixed or varying probabilities, over a given time
